title: Lesbian Vampire Strippers of New Orleans
description: The lesbian vampire strippers of Topaz strip club are in trouble. Sexy Eden and her friends use the club as a legitimate source of income and a front to illegally import blood from overseas, keeping their damaging need to feed directly off of humans at bay. When the Vice Squad raids the club and arrests Dana, the owner, the dancers are cut off from their supply of fresh human blood. As temptation drives the strippers to desperate measures and into each other's arms, can they find a solution before it's too late?Approximately 8975 words.
author: Aziza Amador
